reviewText:
Very authentic moves and forms.
Her English is not great.  But the subtitle on key points compensate for that.
Demonstration is clear and straight. Helpful tips

This is an exceptionally clear and beautiful demonstration of the basic movements of tai chi. Not only for the beginner, advanced students of tai chi can benefit from the precise and elegant basics as well. Master Aiping Cheng is a treasure - an extraordinary performer and superb teacher. Highly recommended!
